=Tiny Tiny RSS Reader for Android=

  # [http://code.google.com/p/ttrss-reader/downloads/list Download] Tiny Tiny RSS Reader;
  # Move the downloaded _.apk_ to your sdcard;
  # Check your settings to allow application installation: go to _Settings_, _Applications_, and check _Unknown sources_;
  # Open the _.apk_ file;

Alternatively, you can use the QR code below:

http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/3686/qrttrssreader010.png

=Set up Tiny Tiny RSS for xml-rpc=
Tiny Tiny RSS need to be set up in order to provide xml-rpc support. Please follow those few steps:

  # Download [http://phpxmlrpc.sourceforge.net/ XML-RPC for PHP];
  # Extract the _lib_ folder from the archive, and upload it to the _lib/xmlrpc/_ folder of your Tiny Tiny RSS instance;

Additionally, _PHP_ must be set to not display notices and warnings. To do so:

  # Open your _php.ini_ file;
  # Look for the line starting by _error_reporting_;
  # Change it by _error_reporting = E_ALL & ~E_NOTICE & ~E_WARNING_;
